questions.question: So hierarchies, if you just think about the nature of a hierarchy, how would you actually build one?
What are the methods of imaging, but even bigger, what can we learn about it?
What would it, what data features would evidence that particular thing that you wanted to put on the map?
Interesting thing is that what would they be called if you were trying to describe these things?
So what is the difference between that and something that we traditionally think of as a living system?
Like what, self-awareness and expanded to consciousness, like, yeah, how can we start to think about consciousness within this framework?
In the same way, is it right to ask, where would I draw the line between conscious and unconscious?
